about.desc: Hi there! I'm Guilherme Jardim and I'm a UX/UI Designer and Frontend Developer from Portugal, and I have the goal to improve the quality of my projects and broaden my skillset!

contacts.desc: I'm always interested in new projects! You can reach me by email or message me in LinkedIn, and I'll be more than happy to answer!

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.desc: We use cookies to give you a better overall experience by saving your preferences. By clicking 'Accept', you are agreeing with the use of cookies.

401.title: Let me in!!!
401.message: You need an authorization type <1>{{error}}</1> to access this page. Sad for you, of course.

403.title: Where do you thing you are going?
403.message: This place is forbidden, <1>{{error}}</1>. Don't even try it.

400.title: Ooops...
400.message: Nothing to see here, <1>{{error}}</1>. Move along!

503.title: I'm unavailable
503.message: And that's all the information you're gonna get. Now move, <1>{{error}}</1>...

408.title: Why...
408.message: Why would you stop my request prematurely, ah? Wait... You clicked the link '<1>{{error}}</1>' times??? HOW?

404.title: Gotcha...
404.message: Seems like this page is missing. Perhaps you should stop trying to hack my <1>{{error}}</1>th system.

500.title: Well... This is awkward...
500.message: Our server is, ah... taking a <1>{{error}}</1> hour break! Yea, sure, why not...
